page.title: 19HOUSING
page.content: {NORTON}is mostly private housing but with approx.120 council house proper- ties in the village. There is some housing development in progress and when completed approx. 80 homes, detached,semi-detached and bungalows will have been built. Principal developers are MILLER and SANDOVER HOMES.{CAMPSALL}is mostly council property but BARRATT HOMES are building 65 private dwellings there. The area is well served with council houses with 485 houses available,85 of which are old age pensioner bungalows, 60 having been built in the last five years. Since the Act allowing sitting tenants to purchase their own properties 125 dwellings have been bought. There is little future development planned but the new{SEWAGE WORKS}could alter this.
